page.title: 05Thame Health Centre
page.content: The Health Centre has been open for 12 years. There are two practices with 9 doctors in all. The centre holds records for 14000 people. These records are strictly confidential. The Thame centre covers Thame, Tetsworth, Tidding -ton, and Towersey. The oldest registered man is 99 and the oldest lady a year younger although we were told that ladies live longer on average. while we were there the baby clinic was open. We saw two children whowere attending the clinic. Ben was 5 months old and was just trying to talk while Nicholas, who was 7 weeks old was just beginning to focus on his hands and was sucking his thumb. Later we saw Andrew who was being innoculated against whooping cough. The Health centre treates people of all ages and provides a vital service to the community.
